mapper.select: select count(*) from liketo where service2_no = #{service2_no} and dol_id = #{dol_id}
mapper.delete: delete from liketo where service2_no = #{service2_no} and dol_id = #{dol_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from liketo where service2_no = #{value}
select A.dol_id, B.dol_name, A.LASTMODIFIED from liketo A, dolbomi B where A.dol_id = B.dol_id and service2_no = #{value}
